Damn niggers be like: My name is Yoshikage Kira. I'm 33 years old. My house is in the northeast section of Morioh, where all the villas are, and I am not married. I work as an employee for the Kame Yu department stores, and I get home every day by 8 PM at the latest. I don't smoke, but I occasionally drink. I'm in bed by 11 PM, and make sure I get eight hours of sleep, no matter what. After having a glass of warm milk and doing about twenty minutes of stretches before going to bed, I usually have no problems sleeping until morning. Just like a baby, I wake up without any fatigue or stress in the morning. I was told there were no issues at my last check-up. I'm trying to explain that I'm a person who wishes to live a very quiet life. I take care not to trouble myself with any enemies, like winning and losing, that would cause me to lose sleep at night. That is how I deal with society, and I know that is what brings me happiness. Although, if I were to fight I wouldn't lose to anyone.
Oh God imagine her back pain while carrying those humongous assests

As much as Takeda Hiromitsu is a legend, his recent works are bland compared to his more ambitious stuff like Sister Breeder. This was a decent fap though, it affirmed my hatred for black people. I hope more artists portray them in manga like literal animals.

Reading takeda hiromitsu doujin is like having a deja vu, almost all his drawing, same scene, same angle, same woman, different dress/swimsuit. Like fuck. Just stop, get some help.

Is it me or has Takeda Hiromitsu's art gotten worse overtime?? 
Like I know he has always had an exaggerated style and that his women are incredibly busty and curvy but, now instead of looking like someone that knows how to draw and exaggerate anatomy he now draws like he has no idea how anatomy works. 
Compare something like Sister Breeder to this and it’s so different how his art style evolved in to something worse. 
It’s clear how he no longer cares about any of this and just puts whatever generic NTR plot that comes to mind in to paper and then doesn’t even have the decency to even finish drawing it.
One of the greats has fallen, hope someone picks up the slack soon.
